format: A monthly multiple time series from 1947(1) to 2004(4) with 4 variables.

parameters.expenditure: personal consumption expenditures price deflator, starting 1959(1).

reference: Online complements to Stock and Watson (2007).
description:
Description
Time series data on 4 US macroeconomic variables for 1947–2004.
title: Monthly US Macroeconomic Data (1947–2004, Stock & Watson)
